ing: 1 (7.2 ounce) package Original Snack FactoryÂ® Pretzel CrispsÂ®
des: "Peanut butter, mascarpone cheese, honey, vanilla and chocolate chips combine for a delicious fun dip for game night or the kids' after school snack. The mascarpone gives this a nice creamy texture."
ins:
Cream together peanut butter, mascarpone cheese, honey, vanilla and salt until well blended. Stir in chocolate chips.
Serve with Snack Factory(R) Pretzel Crisps(R) for dipping.
